title: anyone else getting strangely high ping as of late?
body: usually my ping is around 30, but yesterday and today it has spiked up to around 130. not only that, usually my fps is 70-100, but now it it 30-50. let me know if you are also getting the same problem. I am also using a mac, but i am not sure if that has anything to do with it. pls help rito, i am very sad. {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: The descriptions here sound a lot like packet loss, if it's sudden and drops your fps like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on the impacted game when you get a chance, though, so we can get an overview and know for sure.  Let me know what you find.
